welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Poynton, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, charming shops, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
